snippet: India’s growth may fall to below 6 percent next year as emerging Asian economies lose growth momentum.
abstract: India’s growth may fall to below 6 percent next year as emerging Asian economies lose growth momentum.
lead_paragraph: “A diminished forecast from the Asian Development Bank and another weak economic number from China on Wednesday emphasized that the days of double-digit growth in Asia are a thing of the past as global economic turmoil and slowing momentum hobble the region’s economies,” Bettina Wassener wrote in the International Herald Tribune.

headline.main: Momentum Is Slowing in Asia, Report Says
